This is the [first][1] link.

[1]: https://example.com/first

Links should [be converted][2] to [numeric][3] references.

[2]: https://example.com/converted
[3]: https://brettterpstra.com/numeric

* Links inside
	- Nested list [items][4]
	- Should be placed [outside][5]
* The top level list
* Links that are [repeated][3] should reference their previous occurence.

[4]: https://example.com/items
[5]: https://brettterpstra.com/outside

Existing [reference links][6] should be re-numbered in sequence.

[6]: https://brettterpstra.com/reorder

> Links inside of
> > Nested block quotes [should appear][7]
> > After the parent blockquote
> > And id-less links should be converted

[7]: https://example.com/nested-blockquote
